description.name: btcbbep20
description.tagline: BTCB bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-btcb Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept BTCB bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/btcb receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/btcb wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
